verses.verse: Then Job <WH347> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>,
No doubt <WH551> but ye are the people <WH5971>, And wisdom <WH2451> shall die with you <WH4191>.
But <WH1571> I have understanding <WH3824> as well as you <WH5307>; I am not inferior to you <WH3644>: Yea, who knoweth not such things as these?

I am as one that is a laughing-stock <WH7814> to his neighbor <WH7453>, I who called <WH7121> upon God <WH433>, and he answered <WH6030>: The just <WH6662>, the perfect <WH8549> man is a laughing-stock <WH7814>.
In the thought <WH6248> of him that is at ease <WH7600> there is contempt <WH3940> for misfortune <WH937>; It is ready <WH3559> for them whose foot <WH7272> slippeth <WH4571>.
The tents <WH168> of robbers <WH7703> prosper <WH7951>, And they that provoke <WH7264> God <WH410> are secure <WH987>; Into whose hand <WH3027> God <WH433> bringeth abundantly <WH935>.
But <WH199> ask <WH7592> now the beasts <WH929>, and they shall teach <WH3384> thee <WH5775>; And the birds of the heavens <WH8064>, and they shall tell thee <WH5046>:
Or speak <WH7878> to the earth <WH776>, and it shall teach <WH3384> thee <WH1709>; And the fishes of the sea <WH3220> shall declare unto thee <WH5608>.
Who knoweth <WH3045> not in all these <WH3027>, That the hand of Jehovah <WH3068> hath wrought this <WH6213>,
In whose hand <WH3027> is the soul <WH5315> of every living thing <WH2416>, And the breath <WH7307> of all mankind <WH376>?
Doth not the ear <WH241> try <WH974> words <WH4405>, Even as the palate <WH2441> tasteth <WH2938> its food <WH400>?
With aged <WH3453> men is wisdom <WH2451>, And in length <WH753> of days <WH3117> understanding <WH8394>.
With God is wisdom <WH2451> and might <WH1369>; He hath counsel <WH6098> and understanding <WH8394>.
Behold <WH2040>, he breaketh down, and it cannot be built again <WH1129>; He shutteth up <WH5462> a man <WH376>, and there can be no opening <WH6605>.
Behold <WH6113>, he withholdeth the waters <WH4325>, and they dry up <WH3001>; Again <WH7971>, he sendeth them out, and they overturn <WH2015> the earth <WH776>.
With him is strength <WH5797> and wisdom <WH8454>; The deceived <WH7683> and the deceiver are his <WH7686>.
He leadeth <WH3212> counsellors <WH3289> away stripped <WH7758>, And judges <WH8199> maketh he fools <WH1984>.
He looseth <WH6605> the bond <WH4148> of kings <WH4428>, And he bindeth <WH631> their loins <WH4975> with a girdle <WH232>.
He leadeth <WH3212> priests <WH3548> away stripped <WH7758>, And overthroweth <WH5557> the mighty <WH386>.
He removeth <WH5493> the speech <WH8193> of the trusty <WH539>, And taketh away <WH3947> the understanding <WH2940> of the elders <WH2205>.
He poureth <WH8210> contempt <WH937> upon princes <WH5081>, And looseth <WH7503> the belt <WH4206> of the strong <WH4206>.
He uncovereth <WH1540> deep things <WH6013> out of darkness <WH2822>, And bringeth out <WH3318> to light <WH216> the shadow of death <WH6757>.
He increaseth <WH7679> the nations <WH1471>, and he destroyeth <WH6> them <WH7849>: He enlargeth the nations <WH1471>, and he leadeth them captive <WH5148>.

He taketh away <WH5493> understanding <WH3820> from the chiefs <WH7218> of the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776>, And causeth them to wander <WH8582> in a wilderness <WH8414> where there is no way <WH1870>.
They grope <WH4959> in the dark <WH2822> without light <WH216>; And he maketh them to stagger <WH8582> like a drunken man <WH7910>.
